answers.answer: Has she ever been tested for diabetes?There are websites that put you through a chain of questions (i.e., is the child vomiting, feverish, thirsty, etc.) and they then suggest a possible diagnosis.  One of them is http://www.drugs.com/symptom/unexplained-weight-loss-in-children-2.html.  But really, no website can take the place of a doctor.In your shoes, with that rapid of weight loss (unless the child was obese before and is now exercising a lot or something else explainable), I would be pounding on the doctor's door tomorrow morning and asking for more answers.
